name: Convo Cafe App Case Study
description:
Hello folks! This is the case study format that I got from the google UX design professional certificate course. I hope it will be useful for you, especially for newbie UX designers who want to create a portfolio.


Disclaimer!

All UX designers start as newbies. There is no standard format for making case studies. I want to share the lessons from the Google UX design professional certificate course, especially for newbie UX Designers. Keep the spirit to be the best UX designer.


You can buy me a coffee ☕️ so that I am excited to work even better. Thank you very much!


Support here for growing this project: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/diavanda


Let's connect
